sentences.en: Chandler reputedly controlled more sideline rackets than anyone else on staff.
sentences.cn: 钱德勒素以比饭店里其他职员有更多的生财之道而闻名.

sentences.en: Cider making was a sideline for many farmers.
sentences.cn: 酿造苹果酒是很多农民的一项副业.

sentences.en: Either of the forward positions played near the sideline, especially in hockey.
sentences.cn: 曲棍球队在上个赛季赢得了一连串的胜利.

sentences.en: He asked the spectators to deep back from the sideline.
sentences.cn: 他要求观众们不要走近边线.

sentences.en: He decided to turn his hobby into a lucrative sideline.
sentences.cn: 他决定把自己的爱好变成赚钱的副业.

sentences.en: He is a fruit farmer; he keeps hens as a sideline.
sentences.cn: 他是果农, 外带养鸡.

sentences.en: How much did the sideline bring the farmer family in last year?
sentences.cn: 去年副业使这家农户增加了多少收入?

sentences.en: I am in the farm sideline.
I asked the spectators to keep back from the sideline.
sentences.cn: 我要求观众们不要走近边线.

sentences.en: It was quite a lucrative sideline.
sentences.cn: 那是一份很赚钱的兼职工作。

sentences.en: Joe is an engineer, but he does some translation as a sideline.
sentences.cn: 乔是工程师, 但作为副业他也从事一些翻译.

sentences.en: Mr. Means sold computer disks as a sideline.
sentences.cn: 米恩斯先生以卖计算机硬盘作为副业。

sentences.en: Sideline teams have begun to keep milk cows, pigs and chickens.
sentences.cn: 副业队已开始饲养奶牛 、 猪和鸡.

sentences.en: The coach stood on the sideline s shouting to his players.
sentences.cn: 教练站在场外向他的运动员吆喝.

sentences.en: The stands were overflowing with farm and sideline products.
sentences.cn: 集市上农副产品非常丰富.

sentences.en: They also engage in various kinds of sideline production.
sentences.cn: 他们也从事各种副业生产.

words.tran_cn: 副业；球场边线；局外人的观点

phrases.tran_cn: 袖手旁观；置身局外；不参与

trans.tran_cn: 副业，兼职，（球场等的）边线，（本业以外的）兼售商品，局外人的观点
trans.tran_en: an activity that you do as well as your main job or business, in order to earn more money
